extendedInfo.description: 2G-3G OnOff - simple widget(1x1) for changing network modeIt's shortcut(blame google for that) for network system settings which allows you change 2G-3G and data roaming mode with 2 clicks instead of 4How to add widget:If you on HC, ICS or Jelly Bean:Open All Apps -> Select Widgets tab -> Find widget in the listFor older versions:Long click on empty space on your home screen -> Widgets -> Select widget from the list.If widget doesn't appear on the widget list:it is a bug in launcher, try to restart it:Settings -> Apps -> Running tab -> Click on Show Cached Processes -> Select Launcher From the list and click Stop.Try to re add widgetNOT FOR CDMA PHONESCheck our OnOff Widgets Pack!

reviews.title: Good app
reviews.comment: This app basically creates a shortcut to the mobile data settings. It is useful. After installing power toggles app which does this and lots more, I\'m uninstalling this app
reviews.author: Shashank B

reviews.title: Helpfull
reviews.comment: A very helpfull app. Dont have to go to setting anymore. Just one click and there you go to switch your network data
reviews.author: dian oktaviani

reviews.title: Useless
reviews.comment: I don\'t know why this app don\'t turn off my data but maybe that is not the same as 2g 3g? Other apps I only press the button to turn it off and on but this app show me the phones data settings to manually turn it off. Why can other app do things your can\'t???
reviews.author: G\303\266ran Helsingborg

reviews.title: Good
reviews.comment: Good app but with the option to get to the mobile data settings from the notifications, it makes this app redundant. It was a great app but I won\'t be needing it anymore!
reviews.author: Jordan Le

reviews.title: Very useful
reviews.comment: 3g coverage at my home isn\'t of best quality, so I\'m forced to switch off 3g while being at home. This app saves me a lot of time to open required setting.
reviews.author: Said Babayev

reviews.title: Silly
reviews.comment: Dalga mi geciolar ya, aynisini zaten ayarlarin widgetinden yapabiliyorsunuz.!!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Don\'t think this is useless.
reviews.comment: For people like me, who have very limited data plans, this is a godsend for letting me switch 3G on and off. I\'m glad it doesn\'t take up a lot of space on my phone, too. (And no, not all phones have a handy switch like this, which is exactly why it\'s useful.)
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: This is amazing help.
reviews.comment: It\'s unbelievable Android still doesn\'t support quick 2G-3G switch, instead you have to do 5 clicks and swipes, which is completely retarded for so often used command. This little widget solves this problem.
reviews.author: Tom Pax

reviews.title: Very handy app
reviews.comment: Home screen widget gives direct access to network screen. Data and Network can be toggled without messing around with APN settings. Thanks Curvefish. Is there a donate version?
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Simple, Perfect
reviews.comment: On Jelly Bean 4.2.1 (Nexus 4), this takes changing this setting from 1 swipe and 5 taps, to just 2 taps. Since 3rd party apps can\'t change this setting directly, it\'s just a shortcut to the specific settings screen when you can check/uncheck the \"Use only 2G networks\" setting, which is perfect. Thanks!
reviews.author: Kevin Micke

reviews.title: 2G 3G Switch Widget
reviews.comment: It is very usefull for the Android User who Wants to access Mobile Networks Quickly!
reviews.author: Shashika. M Bulugahahena

reviews.comment: very good if youre not useing dual sim phones. on S6802 samsung galaxy ace duos doesnt work if net sim its on secodary sim slot
reviews.author: Mirel Daniel Radu

reviews.title: Useless
reviews.comment: I\'m on ICS and all this does is install an icon which leads to a help summary telling you how to install the widget. The problem is that no such widget can be found whether you follow the provided instructions or check your widgets list. Waste of time.
reviews.author: Ed Hye

reviews.title: Good
reviews.comment: Nice, does what it says.  Galaxy note 2.
reviews.author: Hans-J Walvig

reviews.title: Excellent
reviews.comment: These curve fish widgets are great. I kinda wish you could download them all at once.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Indirect
reviews.comment: Handy tool but would be good if it  went direct to GSM setting
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Great
reviews.comment: Nice app. Very useful...
reviews.author: W.M.Gayan Madhusanka

reviews.comment: Usefull but not as good as it is supposed to be. Needs 3 clicks... i stead of being a one click switch
reviews.author: Steve Istvan

reviews.title: Very nice
reviews.comment: Nice app,  works fine,  can easily switch between 3g and 2g, no battery drain detected as of yet
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: i advise
reviews.comment: advise every one download it make easy using network
reviews.author: Tranziztor X
